update ezs_goods
addTime = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
deleteStatus = #{deleteStatus,jdbcType=BIT},
addess = #{addess,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ash = #{ash,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bending = #{bending,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
burning = #{burning,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

freely = #{freely,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.select: select count(*) from ezs_goods where recommend = '1'
mapper.update: update ezs_goods set status = 1 where id =#{goodsId}
update ezs_goods set status = 2 where id =#{goodsId}
mapper.sql: g.id, g.addTime, g.deleteStatus, g.addess, g.ash, g.bending, g.burning, g.cantilever, g.click, g.cncl_num, g.collect, g.content, g.crack, g.density, g.flexural, g.freely, g.good_no, g.good_self, g.goods_salenum, g.inventory, g.keyword, g.lipolysis, g.memberLook, g.name, g.price, g.protection, g.purpose, g.recommend, g.recommend_time, g.seo_description, g.source, g.status,g.tensile, g.validity, g.water, g.area_id, g.color_id, g.form_id, g.goodClass_id, g.goods_main_photo_id, g.logistics_id, g.quality_id, g.region_id, g.supply_id, g.user_id, g.util_id, g.classOfFinish_id, g.lockStatus,g.lastModifyDate, a.id aid,a.addTime aaddTime,a.deleteStatus adeleteStatus,a.ext aext,a.height aheight,a.info ainfo,a.name aname, a.path apath,a.size asize,a.width awidth,a.album_id aalbum_id,a.config_id aconfig_id,a.user_id auser_id
mapper.select:
select
from ezs_goods g,ezs_accessory a where g.goods_main_photo_id = a.id and g.name like '%${_parameter}%'

select
from ezs_goods g LEFT JOIN ezs_accessory a on g.goods_main_photo_id = a.id where g.recommend = '1' order by g.recommend_time desc LIMIT #{startPos},#{pageSize}

SELECT goods.id, goods.`name`, goods.addTime, goods.deleteStatus, goods.price, goods.inventory, goods.goods_main_photo_id, CONCAT("http://www.ezaisheng.com/",B.path,"/",B.name) path FROM ezs_goods goods LEFT JOIN ezs_goods_class gc ON goods.goodClass_id = gc. LEVEL LEFT JOIN ezs_accessory B ON goods.goods_main_photo_id=B.id WHERE goods.goodClass_id=#{goodClass_id} GROUP BY goods.id limit 20
select g.* from ezs_goods g where EXISTS (select 1 from ezs_documentshare e where e.good_id = g.id and e.deleteStatus = '0' and e.house = '1' and e.user_id = #{userId})

select g.*,d1.name colorName,d2.name formName, a.areaName areaName,gc.name goodClassName,ac.ext pictureSuffix, ac.name pictureName,CONCAT("http://10.10.10.148/",ac.path,"/",ac.name) picturePath from ezs_goods g left join ezs_dict d1 on g.color_id = d1.id left join ezs_dict d2 on g.form_id = d2.id left join ezs_area a on g.area_id = a.id left join ezs_goods_class gc on g.goodClass_id = gc.id left join ezs_accessory ac on g.goods_main_photo_id = ac.id where g.id = #{id, jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.sql: g.id, g.inventory, g.name, g.price, g.area_id, g.goods_main_photo_id, g.util_id
mapper.select:
select
from ezs_goods g LEFT JOIN ezs_accessory a on g.goods_main_photo_id = a.id where g.recommend = '1' order by g.recommend_time desc LIMIT #{startPos},#{pageSize}

SELECT A.*, (select IF(ISNULL(A.house),0,A.house) collect FROM ezs_documentshare A WHERE A.user_id=#{userid} AND A.good_id=#{goodsid} and A.deleteStatus=0) collected, ( SELECT COUNT(B.id) FROM ezs_dvaluate B WHERE 1 = 1 AND B.goods_id =#{goodsid,jdbcType=BIGINT} ) allcount, FORMAT( ( ( SELECT COUNT(B.id) FROM ezs_dvaluate B WHERE 1 = 1 AND B.goodQuality > 3 AND B.goods_id = #{goodsid,jdbcType=BIGINT} ) / ( SELECT COUNT(C.id) FROM ezs_dvaluate C WHERE 1 = 1 AND C.goods_id = #{goodsid,jdbcType=BIGINT} ) ), 2 )*100 highp
FROM ezs_goods A WHERE A.id = #{goodsid,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select
from ezs_goods g,ezs_accessory a where g.goods_main_photo_id = a.id and g.`name` like #{0} and EXISTS (select 1 from ezs_documentshare e where e.user_id= #{1} and e.house = '1' and e.good_id = g.id)
